Text:
Hi there!

I'll be out for some days, so I'll upload this week's episodes next Monday.

Happy New Year everyone!!

Thanks a lot for all your hard work Claudia,
Enjoy your holiday and Happy New Year to you as well !

ClaudiaZ,

Thank you muchly for all your hard work and for allowing those of us who have a "daytime drama" guilty pleasure a place we can go for our "fix"!

Have a Happy, Safe and Wonderful New Year! Much Magic to you!

Thanks for the uploads, have a good hollydays!
and happy new year
Thanks for all your work Claudia... I download these episodes for an elderly lady that can't afford pay TV, which is the only place you can see Y & R in Australia. Have a great holiday.
